title: Mcp-Server-Toolhouse
description: MCP server to connect MCP clients with Toolhouse tools, enabling seamless integration with external tools and data sources.
creator: toolhouse-community

TOOLHOUSE_API_KEY.description: API key obtained from the Toolhouse dashboard.

GROQ_API_KEY.description: API key obtained from the Groq API console.

TOOLHOUSE_BUNDLE_NAME.description: Name of the Toolhouse bundle created containing desired tools.
